_meanings:
{@--2@} To have 
power, be master, prevail.

{@--4@} To bless, wish
well to, give blessings to; (said
to be <ab>Atm.</ab> only in this sense);
{#nATitaSame#} <ls>Mv. 1. 11</ls>; (Mammaṭa
quotes the line {#dInaM tvAmanunATate#} 
{#kucayugaM patrAvftaM mA kfTAH#} to show that
{#nAT#} here only means ‘to ask or
beg’, and says that {#nATate#} should,
therefore, be {#nATati#}); {#sarpizo nATate#} <ls>Sk.</ls>
